https://tmrev.io/movie/264134-A Ninja Pays Half My Rent 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null When your roommate dies from an allergic reaction to fruit and the rent is due and you don't have the cash to cover it, there's no time to mess around picking a new roommate. So it goes that our hero in this short comes to share his home with a ninja. A Ninja Pays Half My Rent
